Description:
Detects DLL sideloading of DLLs usually located in system locations (System32, SysWOW64, etc.).

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential System DLL Sideloading From Non System Locations
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (image_loaded="*\\aclui.dll" OR image_loaded="*\\activeds.dll" OR image_loaded="*\\adsldpc.dll" OR image_loaded="*\\aepic.dll" OR image_loaded="*\\apphelp.dll" OR
